name: CURSE DODGER
description:
Entry for Kenney Jam 2020 / Theme Cursed

Curse Dodger

  • Dodge the flying curse words! 
  • Arrow Keys / A+D keys to move left and right!
  • Spacebar to Jump!
  • Collect the Gems! 
  • Get to the Exit!

Made with the following Kenney Assets:

  • Background Elements Redux (Kenney Assets 3)
  • Emote Pack (Kenney Assets 3)
  • Platformer Characters (Kenney Assets 2)
  • Simplified Platformer Tiles / items (Kenney Assets 2)
  • Retro Sounds (Kenney Assets 1)
  • Ken Pixel Font (Kenney Assets 1)

Also made with the following Cinopt Studios Unity Game Assets:

  • Drag and Drop Pause Menu
  • 2D Sidescroller Starter Kit
